Text.Page: Before you go to the platform, I have a request. I'm sorry to do this when you're in such a hurry, but this should benefit all of us.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What is it?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I think you already saw the Azart Molochs hiding underground.

If you get rid of them, we'll be able to move faster.

That's not an easy job, but you made it look so easy. I'll hurry my way to the platform.

Don't forget what I told you. I'll meet you at the platform.
